import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-dep', templateUrl: './show-dep.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-dep.component.css'], }) export class ShowDepComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private service: SharedService) {} DepartmentList: any = []; ngOnInit(): void { this.refreshDepList(); } refreshDepList() { this.service.getDepList().subscribe((data) => { this.DepartmentList = data; }); } }
